gameDetails.name: Western Empires: The Special Buildings Expansion
gameDetails.description:
Western Empires: The Special Buildings Expansion is an expansion set that is compatible with Mega Empires: The West (2019) and Mega Civilization (2015). It provides additional flavor to the game through 9 miniatures of ancient buildings historically associated with each of the civilizations in the game. These buildings can be build on the map board and provide additional benefits in play and victory points to their controller.

—description from the designers
